# ShinySpider

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ShinySpider is to a font-end to query and modify any graph based 
network structure.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ShinySpider from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# remotes::install_github()
```
